name: A Flawless Plan That Includes A Radio-controlled Robot
name_original: A Flawless Plan That Includes A Radio-controlled Robot
description: You are a radio controlled robot with only 4 actions. Your task, getting to the beat, is to enter the correct combinations of actions. Thus, you must go through the entire laboratory, avoid falling into traps and exterminate all infected robots controlled by an evil computer.  Control keys: x - dot, c - dash
